name: Burger Flipper
description:
Long Ago all Cubidians lived in harmony. Yet this peaceful time did not last for long. An evil villain has started robotically controlling food, giving them sentience, and making them attack harmless citizens. Your job is to fight back against the waves of evil food, to get to, and destroy, the evil Cubidian. Your journey will be tough, but as the mayor of this city, I believe in you.

CONTROLS

Move: Click in the green circle to move.

Attack: Once you move a red circle appears, click enemies inside of it to hit them and damage them.

Skip Action: To skip any action like moving or attack press SPACE, you can also press skip in the bottom right of your screen.

Switch Weapons: You can switch weapons with 1 or 2, you can also switch them by clicking in the bottom middle of your screen, switching weapons will change attack range.

Lives: Your lives are in the bottom left corner of the screen, spend them wisely.

This is a Genre combination of Turned Based Strategy, Real Time Strategy, Horde Shoot-em-up.
